document.heading: District of Columbia Sales Tax Amendment Act of 1987

history.narrative: Law 7-24, the “District of Columbia Sales Tax Amendment Act of 1987,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-243, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 16, 1987 and June 30, 1987, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 6, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 7-45 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
